title: Software Development Engineer II
description: I'm part of the team that developed and launched the new AWS WorkSpaces Thin Client service

title: Software Development Engineer
description: I was a member of the WorkMail team. In particular, I led the design and development of the 'Impersonation Roles' project, allowing secure programmatic access to mailboxes. Additionally, I contributed to features like 'Mobile Device Access Overrides' and 'Mobile Device Access Rules', giving customers more control over their mailboxes.

title: Visiting Researcher
description: Developed an emotion recognition algorithm for horses using image classifiers and convolutional neural networks. I also implemented features for the Climate Colab platform

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: I was part of the Movistar Home team, where I contributed to the development of backend tests
